name: Reaper Mansion
description:
You were hired as a caretaker in Reaper Mansion. However, this mansion is haunted and the grim reaper is going on a killing spree. Escape from this mansion as fast as you can , lest the reaper slash you into pieces.

Mechanics
  • Some doors are locked. You need to find keys to open them.
  • Staying in one room continuously for a long period of time will invite the grim reaper to savor your soul.
  • The grim reaper does give you second chances though. You can try to escape again from the same position you died.

Will you successfully escape this haunted mansion , or lock yourself out and keep dying and reviving indefinitely.Your escaping skills are put to test!
